article: india has allowed international aid agencies deep into militarized _ and formerly forbidden _ border areas in kashmir , where tens of thousands of people are seeking relief after last week 's devastating earthquake , aid workers said saturday .
abstract: india allows foreign aid groups into off-limits border areas in kashmir
